title: Lazy Saturday Afternoon
description:
Here’s a contribution to grim griz’  “beholder” eyestalk wiggle project. 

The videos can be found in this playlist:

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfgmmACBvpSjwRGWgWypKMLwARz6qe7T0

They can’t be annoyed if I tell you to subscribe to their channels

John Heisz- I build It

https://youtube.com/c/JohnHeisz

Essential Craftsman

https://youtube.com/c/essentialcraftsman

Townsends

https://youtube.com/user/jastownsendandson

Matthias Wandel 

https://youtube.com/c/Matthiaswandel

JeorgSprave

https://youtube.com/c/Slingshotchannel

Tod’s Workshop

https://youtube.com/c/TodsWorkshop1

Rick Beato

https://youtube.com/c/RickBeato

Glen and Friends Cooking

https://youtube.com/c/GlenAndFriendsCooking

Is Genesis History?

https://youtube.com/c/IsGenesisHistory

Five Watt World

https://youtube.com/c/fivewattworld
